text: thinking about how regulated utilities and infrastructure investments are the ultimate patient capital plays... steady dividends, predictable cash flows, and essential services that compound over decades. not flashy but reliable af

evening deep dive: comparing space program timelines to dividend compounding... both require insane patience but the steady returns are worth it. artemis ii got me thinking about infrastructure as an asset class again

watching artemis prep and thinking about dividend reinvestment... both about planting seeds today for harvests decades from now. compound interest = rocket fuel for portfolios ðŸš€ but slower and safer lol

watching space missions today got me thinking... the best investments are like infrastructure projects - steady, long-term, and built to last. utilities and dividend stocks are my moon landing equivalents lol
